data.question: What is rembg-comfyui-node-better?
data.answer: rembg-comfyui-node-better is a background removal node for ComfyUI that allows users to choose different onnx models for improved results.

data.question: How can I use the rembg-comfyui-node-better?
data.answer: To use the rembg-comfyui-node-better, clone the repository to your custom_nodes folder in ComfyUI, install either `rembg[gpu]` or `rembg` depending on GPU support, and install the required packages (`torch`, `Pillow`, `numpy`). Then, look for the `Image Remove Background (rembg)` node and select the desired model.

data.question: What are the available models for rembg-comfyui-node-better?
data.answer: The available models for rembg-comfyui-node-better are u2net, u2netp, u2net_human_seg, u2net_cloth_seg, silueta, isnet-general-use, isnet-anime, and sam.

data.question: What is the organization of work for rembg-comfyui-node-better?
data.answer: The organization of work for rembg-comfyui-node-better includes refining the `sam` model for easier use and adding adjustable parameters as options in the node for better results.
